name: kutt
description: Kutt is an open source URL shortener with custom domains, link statistics, API and link management. It can be self hosted for organizations wanting branded, privacy conscious link shortening services.

features.title: Url Shortening
features.description: Create short, memorable URLs for long links. Simplify link sharing

features.title: Custom Domains
features.description: Use your own branded domains for short links. Professional link branding

features.title: Custom Slugs
features.description: Choose custom short codes for memorable URLs. Create branded short links

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Track clicks, referrers, browsers, and geographic data. Understand link performance

features.title: Password Protection
features.description: Protect links with passwords for private sharing. Secure sensitive links

features.title: Expiration Dates
features.description: Set expiration dates for temporary links. Automatic link deactivation

features.title: REST API
features.description: RESTful API for programmatic link creation and management. Automate URL shortening

features.title: Browser Extension
features.description: Create short links directly from browser. Quick link generation
